page.title: 16Hatfield Main Colliery.
page.content: Hatfield Main Pit mines high quality coal from the High Hazel seam.At present 1250 people are employed.About 235 jobs will be lost over the next year.The coal produced is mainly for power stations,the rest is sold as house coal.It is transported by rail and lorry respectively.The oldest spoil heap has been landscaped with grass and trees.The open air swimming pool was financed by the miners. Hatfield Main Brass Band has 25 juniors and 40 in the senior band which play in clubs and give concerts.
